last_episode_to_air.name: Reunion Part 2
last_episode_to_air.overview: The dramatic reunion concludes as West and Ciara consider their future. Amanda makes an emotional revelation about her health. Lindsay and Carl go head-to-head about the details of their breakup.

name: Summer House
overview: Take the beach town of Montauk, New York by storm while following a group of nine friends who make the exclusive enclave their go-to party spot between Memorial Day and Labor Day — that is, when they're not hustling at their day jobs. You could say they work hard and party way harder.

episodes.name: Summer House
episodes.overview: A group of New Yorkers rent a summerhouse in Montauk, N.Y.; Ashley and Lauren extend an invitation to their friend, Stassi, who sets her sights on Kyle; longtime friends Everett and Lindsay become intimate; new guy Carl plays the field.

episodes.name: Codependence Day
episodes.overview: There are fireworks on Independence Day; Lauren and Carl's relationship heats up in the bedroom; Kyle juggles two women at a party; love birds Everett and Lindsay's explosive antics prove they're anything but the perfect couple.

episodes.name: Flirting With Disaster
episodes.overview: Kyle confronts "perfect couple" Everett and Lindsay for disrupting his "single" summer. New house guest Jaclyn raises eyebrows with her Southern sensibility...or lack thereof. Carl gets caught in a lie that threatens his new relationship with Lauren.

episodes.name: The Wrath of Wirkus
episodes.overview: Lauren confronts Carl for lying about bringing a date to a wedding. Kyle dips his toe back into the ex-pool, despite everyone's warnings. Lindsay and Cristina's roommate drama boils over into full-on name calling and accusations.

episodes.name: Wine, Whining, And Wieners
episodes.overview: When the roommates go to a winery there is more "whine" than wine. As the drama between Lindsay and Cristina reaches its breaking point, someone may be evicted. Carl cools off on Lauren but warms up to Jaclyn at a beach bonfire.

episodes.name: Model Behavior
episodes.overview: The roommates go from blowing out candles for Kyle's birthday surprise to a blowout fight that derails everyone's good time and leave Lindsay and Everett on the brink of a breakup. Meanwhile, at Model Volleyball, Cristina serves up some juicy gossip that Jaclyn hasn't been a model friend to Lauren. And at long last, the Wirkus parents meet the infamous Carl.

episodes.name: Hoedown Showdown
episodes.overview: It's Lindsay's birthday and trouble's a brewing when Carl brings girls to the party, much to Lauren's dismay. Everett and Lindsay are on the outs, and Stephen spills a secret that may make the "on and off" again couple turn the switch off permanently.

episodes.name: Sprained Relationships
episodes.overview: With a scandalous secret looming over Lindsay and Everett's relationship, the pressure is on for the power couple to sink or swim. The roommates must come together to throw a race for charity, but not everyone will make it out in one piece. And finally, Cristina's meddling catches up to her when Lauren and Jaclyn go on the attack.

episodes.name: The No Good, Very Bad Rosé Day
episodes.overview: It's time for the annual Rosé Party, where Kyle meets a fellow blonde who may or may not be his drunken soul mate. It's Cristina vs everyone else, as the roommates take aim at her meddling ways.

episodes.name: Winter Is Coming
episodes.overview: Summer's over, and that means one last wild weekend with no regrets...or maybe a few. A Hamptons White Party turns into a messy affair when Kyle blows up at his ex-girlfriend Amanda over a lip-syncing scandal. Meanwhile, Cristina makes a dramatic exit, and Carl and Lauren's romantic pretzel twists one final time, when Carl disappears into the night.

episodes.name: Passing The Torch
episodes.overview: The gang is back for another summer; room selections cause things to get off to a rocky start; Stephen prepares to attend Gay Pride; Lindsay enjoys her freedom; Lauren and Danielle navigate their complicated feelings about sharing a house with Carl.

episodes.name: Stars and Gripes
episodes.overview: The second weekend of the summer is a big one and the crew prepares for their big July 4th bash. Kyle and Amanda talk about the next steps for their relationship while Carl and Lauren struggle with unresolved feelings. But when Danielle drops a bomb during a girls' day, everything comes to a head as the crew celebrates the country's independence in glorious fashion.

episodes.name: Bonfire Insanity
episodes.overview: Tensions are running high in the house, and Lindsay finds herself in the middle of the drama. The crew sets off for a sunset sail and beach bonfire, where these tensions boil over. The housemates return to the Hamptons, where Kyle and Amanda’s relationship faces setbacks. Danielle gains her housemates access to a very special place in the Hamptons with hopes that it will bring them all back to harmony.

episodes.name: Don't Poke the Bear
episodes.overview: With the summer house finally back to its free-spirited, hard partying ways, Amanda begins to show her frustration with Kyle’s continued boozy behavior and decides to let him have a weekend to himself. Lindsay gets in touch with her ex, Everett after failing to forget about him. Meanwhile, Lauren and Carl appear to have moved past the fiasco from the 4th and are back to being friends (with benefits) but Danielle continues to be an unwelcome third party in their relationship.

episodes.name: Smashelorette
episodes.overview: Lauren's twin sister, Ashley, is back in the Hamptons for their older sister's bachelorette weekend and she is not happy to see how cozy Carl and Lauren have gotten. Lindsay goes on her first date since Everett with a hot younger man. Kyle takes a big step with Amanda during a romantic dinner. And Stephen finally puts his issues with Carl out on the table.

episodes.name: Mother Knows Best
episodes.overview: The gang hosts their moms for the weekend. Lindsay tries to be a good friend. Kyle braces for his mother officially meeting Amanda’s mother.

episodes.name: The Exes Are Coming
episodes.overview: The moms’ weekend comes to a close with a revealing game before the gang all head back to the city. Everyone returns to the Hamptons ready to celebrate Kyle’s birthday weekend. Carl and Lauren clear the air of all the past weekend’s drama, Stephen goes on a blind date, and Danielle has a houseguest. Everything kicks into high gear when Kyle’s “revolutionary” 35th birthday party gets officially sent as Lindsay anxiously awaits the arrival of a very special guest.

episodes.name: Say It With Flowers
episodes.overview: Kyle's epic 35th birthday party ends with a major disruption from Lindsay; Stephen visits his family in Alabama; Amanda becomes frustrated by Kyle's behavior on a party bus; Carl and Lauren try out the friend zone, with questionable results.

episodes.name: Summer Should Be Fun!
episodes.overview: Kyle and Amanda’s relationship feels the strain of existing in the house while Lindsay attempts to get her single summer back on track and Lauren moves on from Carl with a few new prospects. Back from Alabama, Stephen is ready to take his fling more seriously but struggles with mixed signals and Carl asks for permission to let a new love interest spend the night.

episodes.name: A House Divided
episodes.overview: Kyle and Amanda attempt to repair their ever-growing rift; Carl chooses to put his cards on the table with his latest lady friend; Lindsay has some shocking news for Everett; Lauren's twin, Ashley, returns and sees some welcome changes in her sister.

episodes.name: Lei It To Rest
episodes.overview: It's the final weekend of summer and the house throws a massive luau. Ashley's husband arrives just as everyone is at odds with each other. Carl and Stephen confront their issues. And the housemates have had enough of Kyle and Amanda's drama.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: The gang sit down with Andy Cohen to discuss season two shenanigans and everything that went down on and off screen.

episodes.name: Elephant in the Room
episodes.overview: The housemates return to the Hamptons with several new friends in tow; unresolved issues between Kyle, Lindsay and Danielle quickly spread through the house; Carl vows to focus on his work and never hook up with a summer share housemate again.

episodes.name: Cloudy With a Chance of Arguments
episodes.overview: Tensions come to a head during a trip to the beach; Kyle and Amanda discuss moving in together; Carl struggles with meeting his sales quota; the housemates prepare for their annual Fourth of July party; Jordan flirts with both Danielle and Lindsay.

episodes.name: Firework Starter
episodes.overview: Fireworks continue as the 4th of July party winds down. Danielle gets a taste of Jordan, but after their tryst, he sets his eyes on Paige. Lindsay reconnects with Everett. Kyle and Amanda work together on their new startup. At Girls Night, the ladies break the news of Jordan’s true feelings to Danielle.

episodes.name: Pantry Passion
episodes.overview: Danielle forgives Jordan, who continues to wreak havoc in the house; Kyle woos Amanda; the housemates visit a vineyard; Hannah attends her grandfather's birthday party; Carl and Paige's flirtation leads him to violate his cardinal rule.

episodes.name: The Grapes of Wrath
episodes.overview: Jordan continues to offend his housemates; Paige isn't sure Carl checks off all her boxes; during a fight, Amanda admits she has cold feet about moving in with Kyle, and she issues an ultimatum.

episodes.name: Swimming Uphill
episodes.overview: Kyle changes his behavior; Carl and Paige go on a date in the city, but Paige still isn't sure if Carl is marriage material; Hannah confronts Lindsay about her backhanded compliments; the housemates head to a swanky St. Barth's party in the Hamptons.

episodes.name: Epic Grand Gesture
episodes.overview: The housemates throw a Christmas in July party and exchange secret Santa gifts; Kyle has a special present for Amanda; Hannah invites her British beau to the party; Carl vies for Paige's attention, but she ignores his advances, and he goes too far.

episodes.name: Ring around the Rumor
episodes.overview: Carl complains to Lindsay about Paige, and Lindsay's advice is overheard, causing a chain reaction among the women in the house. Meanwhile, as Kyle prepares to ask Amanda to take their relationship to the next level, another cheating rumour surfaces.

episodes.name: Rumors Gone Wild
episodes.overview: While Kyle is at his family reunion, Amanda plays single with Paige and Hannah. Danielle confronts Jordan about their tension, and possibly uncovers a secret. Lindsay confides in Danielle about another scandalous rumour, only for Danielle to end up telling Paige everything. Amanda, Kyle and their housemates celebrate Kyle's 36th birthday at a Monte Carlo night.

episodes.name: True or False
episodes.overview: Lindsay confronts Kyle about the shocking rumor; Kyle tells Amanda the real story; Carl's mother comes to town to surprise him; after Amanda ignores Kyle all week, he waits outside of her office desperate to confront her.

episodes.name: Wing-Mom
episodes.overview: Carl's mum drops by the summer house, much to Paige's delight. Hannah finally takes the next step with British Dave, and in an effort to move on from Everett, Lindsay goes on a date with Peyman. Amanda's parents make her rethink her decision to stay with Kyle after the cheating scandal, and Jordan reveals a secret.

episodes.name: Pumped Up
episodes.overview: Jordan finally meets a girl he'd bring home to mum, while Paige and Carl argue over who misled whom in their relationship. Stassi, Beau, Katie and Tom from `Vanderpump Rules' drop by the house and end up giving Lindsay some advice on love.

episodes.name: The Cookie Crumbles
episodes.overview: The Vanderpumps continue their visit and Kyle accuses Paige of leading Carl on. Hannah tears into Jordan, Carl brings a date to the house, Tom has an emergency requiring a trip to the hospital, and Kyle reveals he's ready to propose to Amanda.

episodes.name: Will You Bury Me?
episodes.overview: It's the last weekend at the house, and the crew gets together for one more epic "death of summer" party; Carl gets closer to Kristen; Paige embraces being single; Kyle asks for Amanda's father's blessing to propose but gets a lukewarm response.

episodes.name: The Big Bang
episodes.overview: The summer starts off with a bang when Carl takes his friendship with Lindsay to the next level. While the returning housemates savour the juicy gossip, newbies Luke and Jules wonder what they've signed up for.

episodes.name: Mice Will Play
episodes.overview: With house parents Kyle and Amanda away at a family wedding, the `kids' are ready to run wild; Lindsay's friend, Danielle, joins the party; Luke pulls out all the stops to court Hannah, even though she's looking for a commitment from another guy.

episodes.name: Worst. Date. Ever.
episodes.overview: As the house gears up for its Fourth of July party, Jules wants to be friends with Paige, while Luke wants to be intimate with Hannah; Carl and Lindsay's first date is a full-blown disaster; Amanda slams the door in Kyle's face, setting him off.

episodes.name: Red, White and Ewwww
episodes.overview: The yearly Fourth of July bash is usually a high point for Kyle and his trusty mullet wig, but things are so rocky with Amanda that the only love he may get is from Carl; Lindsay gives Hannah's friend Armand the third degree.

episodes.name: Hamptons Vice
episodes.overview: Hannah invites her old buddy Jordan for the weekend and the housemates are surprised to learn that he has a romantic history with somebody in the house; when Hannah gets news about Armand, it helps her make a decision about Luke.

episodes.name: Caged Heat
episodes.overview: As Lindsay and Carl try to fix what's left of their friendship, Luke and Hannah's continuous flirtation leads to their first date going to new heights; it's a house divided for girls' and guys' night.

episodes.name: Love Her, Boy
episodes.overview: Kyle surprises Amanda with a shocking answer to a simple question; Luke revs up his courtship of Hannah with a motorcycle ride as Jules tries to break through a sexual roadblock; Carl and Lindsay try to move forward with new flings of their own.

episodes.name: Exes and Oh-No's
episodes.overview: Kyle and Amanda's mothers visit for the weekend; and the boys of "Summer House" behave badly; Jordan stuns Jules; Luke shocks the house with his relationship status; Carl still can't make things right with Lindsay.

episodes.name: Pledge Master, Beer Lord
episodes.overview: Kyle and Amanda turn the house into a petting zoo for Kyle's birthday; Paige laments that friend Hannah has fallen under Luke's spell; Carl invites his new fling to the house; a spat between Jules and Jordan escalates into a possible eviction.

episodes.name: Clique Bait
episodes.overview: As Kyle's birthday party comes to an end, Jules wonders if her time at the house is coming to a screeching halt; with Hannah distracted by Luke, Paige and Amanda don't hesitate to throw her under the bus.

episodes.name: A Birthday to Die For
episodes.overview: Lindsay turns the house into a crime scene for her murder mystery-themed birthday; Paige is put in an uncomfortable position as tension between Hannah and Amanda escalates over Hannah's involvement with Luke, who is still hung up on an ex

episodes.name: Offensive Rebound
episodes.overview: When Hannah calls it quits with Luke, Paige and Amanda are thrilled to get their friend back; a day trip to the orchard leaves a sour taste in everyone's mouth; a night of passion leaves one house mate feeling satisfied, but others feeling betrayed.

episodes.name: America’s Roast Wanted
episodes.overview: Paige and Amanda confront Hannah about her steamy night; Carl and Jules bond over their summer of relationship mishaps; barbs are exchanged at the first-ever house roast, but not everybody can take the heat.

episodes.name: Rave Goodbye
episodes.overview: It's the final weekend at the Summer House, but before the housemates celebrate with an epic end of summer rave, it's a house divided for Kyle and Amanda's bachelor and bachelorette festivities.

episodes.name: Secrets Revealed
episodes.overview: The Summer House crew continues to bring the heat in this never-before-seen footage from Season 4. From fiery flings to rocky relationships, get the inside scoop on moments you didn't see this season.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: Andy welcomes the cast of "Summer House" for an online reunion. Lindsay Hubbard talks about the clique that formed in the house. Luke Gulbranson and Hannah Berner talk about their relationship. Carl Radke has news.

episodes.name: Kiss and Don't Tell
episodes.overview: Lindsay is trying to take her relationship with Stephen to the next level; Paige decides if Perry is the one for her; the housemates learn that Luke is bringing a new girl to the house.

episodes.name: Let the Good Times Roll
episodes.overview: Carl hosts a reception for his mom's virtual wedding; Danielle throws a roller-skating party; the housemates want to throw Kyle a birthday party.

episodes.name: The Sandwich Between Us
episodes.overview: While the cold war between Luke and Hannah shows no signs of warming, Lindsay wonders if she is actually the priority in her relationship with Stephen; the housemates plan a family dinner to get back on track, but it leaves the house divided.

episodes.name: Trash Talk
episodes.overview: The crew decides to let loose in an all-out mullet extravaganza, the debauchery continues; much to the chagrin of Paige and Amanda, Hannah and Luke reconcile; the real war begins when Kyle calls a house meeting.

episodes.name: Best Frenemies
episodes.overview: Luke thinks a flirtatious flower delivery will get his relationship with Ciara back on track; Stephen attempts to cheer Lindsay up with a romantic birthday dinner; Hannah and Amanda's friendship takes a turn; Carl receives devastating news.

episodes.name: Power-Pointless
episodes.overview: Kyle is enraged to find his housemates have more laid-back plans for their Saturday night; Lindsay finally receives a grand gesture from Stephen; Carl returns from Pittsburgh to find the house in shambles.

episodes.name: Medium at Large
episodes.overview: Kyle tries to make amends with Hannah; Lindsay grapples with ending her relationship with Stephen; rumours spread like wildfire when Hannah receives an explosive tip from her psychic.

episodes.name: Crawl Me Maybe
episodes.overview: Lindsay and Luke's maybe-not-so-innocent friendship is called into question when Amanda and Paige confront them about the juicy hook-up rumour; sparks fly between Ciara and Carl; the guys corner Luke and demand he account for his behaviour.

episodes.name: Should I Stay or Should I Go?
episodes.overview: A pub crawl devolves into a serious conflict between the boys, causing Luke to leave the house; Lindsay wonders if she made a mistake when she broke up with Stephen; Kyle surprises Amanda for their two-year engagement anniversary.

episodes.name: Couples Retreat
episodes.overview: With Stravy's return, the house is abuzz about Lindsay's chaotic relationship; Hannah and Danielle take phone relationships to the next level; Luke is blindsided by information about Hannah and Des; Paige questions her relationship with Perry.

episodes.name: Derby Days
episodes.overview: Lindsay decides it's time to take her relationship to the next level and make her ring size known; Carl throws a Derby-themed party, complete with a housemates horse race; Hannah finds herself in the hot seat.

episodes.name: Makeups and Breakups
episodes.overview: It's the final days at the house and to commemorate the end of summer, the housemates throw a wedding-themed party for Kyle and Amanda; Hannah, Paige and Ciara navigate their complicated friendships; Lindsay and Stravy continue their relationship.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: Ciara, Luke and Hannah revisit the unraveling of their love triangle; Lindsay admits what Stravy was really doing in the house when he claimed to be working; the housemates confront Hannah about her recent statements in the press and on podcasts.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: Carl discusses his struggles with sobriety; Luke accuses Hannah of turning the house against him; Paige is caught in the middle of Hannah and Amanda's issues; Hannah is confronted about what she and Des did in Kyle and Amanda's bathroom.

episodes.name: Where's My Lover, Boy?
episodes.overview: Kyle's late-night shenanigans are suspicious to fiancée Amanda and raise a red flag to their friends; an old flame returns and instantly heats things up for Paige; Lindsay drops a bomb on Carl that no one saw coming.

episodes.name: Star-spangled Drama
episodes.overview: The housemates throw their annual bash; after a big disagreement, Amanda focuses on having fun while Kyle struggles to get in the mood to party.

episodes.name: Heartbreak in the Hamptons
episodes.overview: After a rocky first weekend, Kyle and Amanda try to find sturdy ground in their relationship; Carl tries to get to know Ciara better, but soon realizes there might be someone else in the way.

episodes.name: Charmed, I'm Not Sure
episodes.overview: After a shocking revelation about Craig, Paige gives her Southern charmer a taste of his own medicine with her Italian romancer; Lindsay has the time of her life as her "Hot Hubbs Summer" continues; Mya and Carl begin to form a bond.

episodes.name: Birthday Hex
episodes.overview: Following their passionate spin the bottle kiss, Ciara and Alex wonder if there's more between them than physical attraction; Paige's heart begins to drift away from Craig and toward Andrea, who's looking for something real.

episodes.name: Summer Should Be Kinky
episodes.overview: Andrea is fully in his element throwing an epic 50 Shades of Summer party, and he continues to seduce Paige in the process; while Lindsay is away for the weekend, Carl returns to the Hamptons in a better place, thanks to a new lady in his life.

episodes.name: One Basket, Too Many Eggs
episodes.overview: Ciara gives Alex a chance, while Paige makes a long-distance confession to Craig that leaves him livid. With Kyle and Amanda's rocky relationship on full display, the ladies of the house take it upon themselves to stage an intervention with Amanda. And Lindsay learns some life-changing news with Danielle by her side.

episodes.name: A Twisted Fairytale
episodes.overview: Lindsay throws an epic, twisted fairy-tale birthday bash to celebrate turning 35; when Austen arrives, Ciara isn't the only princess in the house who has eyes for this Southern Prince Charming; Paige and Craig's relationship moves in a new direction.

episodes.name: Happily Ever Never
episodes.overview: Love is in the air as Lindsay's fairytale birthday continues; Carl's new fling seems to be fitting right in, and Mya hits it off with a potential suitor; Andrea does his best to put himself back on the market.

episodes.name: That's Not Amore!
episodes.overview: Things between Carl and his crush start to heat up; Craig is back in town, and Paige wonders if she's finally ready to take things to the next level; Andrea brings an Italian dinner tradition to the Hamptons.

episodes.name: Hurricane Warning
episodes.overview: After a heated exchange at dinner, the house attempts to undo the damage; Craig reveals his intentions with Paige; Lindsay admits she may have feelings for Austen; with time running out before their wedding, Kyle pressures Amanda for a prenup.

episodes.name: Playing with Fire
episodes.overview: At Danielle's beachside bonfire, Lindsay's heart is burning for her latest suitor; Mya is hesitant about her new relationship; when Andrea breaks down about his recent heartbreak, Paige wonders if he was using her the past few months.

episodes.name: Pre-nope
episodes.overview: The last weekend of summer starts with a bang; tensions rise among the housemates at dinner; Lindsay's Hot Hubbs pursuits land her back in the hot seat.

episodes.name: Keep Prom and Carry On
episodes.overview: The housemates let loose with a prom party; Lindsay and Carl explore a flirtatious side of their friendship; the arrival of an unexpected guest leaves Paige speechless; Kyle and Amanda are feeling the pressure.

episodes.name: A Happy Sending
episodes.overview: Kyle and Amanda's big day approaches; Lindsay and Carl address their feelings towards each other; Paige and Craig finally put a label on their relationship; Kyle and Amanda are hit with a blow that no one saw coming.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: As the Summer House reunion kicks off, Lindsay defends her Hot Hubbs Summer; Carl tarnishes his friendship with a surprising housemate along the way; Also, Danielle's relationship is questioned.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: The reunion concludes with Kyle and Amanda giving an update on their prenup question; Lindsay reveals why she stopped drinking and gives insight into her romance with Carl.

episodes.name: Star Spangled Feud
episodes.overview: The housemates are back in the Hamptons; Carl and Lindsay are living their version of a real-life fairy tale; Kyle and Mya see changes in Carl and have theories behind his personality shift; three new housemates join the party.

episodes.name: A Line in the Sand
episodes.overview: Kyle and Carl finally address their issues; Mya confronts Lindsay over their tense conversation in Los Angeles; Gabby continues her pursuit of a hot prospect; Ciara joins the share house.

episodes.name: A Cup of LoyalTea
episodes.overview: Danielle and Gabby agree to move past shady men; Chris takes his shot with Ciara; Kyle is frustrated with Carl and Lindsay; the girls enjoy an afternoon of sipping and spilling the tea until a revelation from Danielle threatens to derail the party.

episodes.name: Pillow Talk
episodes.overview: Carl returns to the Loverboy offices and his work issues with Kyle come to a head; back in the Hamptons, Andrea rejoins the crew with hopes for an Italian dinner do-over; a slumber party turns from wild fun into a bad dream for the housemates.

episodes.name: The Hangover
episodes.overview: The slumber party turns into a nightmare when a blowup between Kyle and Lindsay leaves Carl stuck in the middle; Gabby leads the charge on the first bash of the summer; a confession from Danielle turns Lindsay's world upside down.

episodes.name: Panic at the Disco
episodes.overview: The housemates throw their first big party of the summer as Kyle confronts the fallout from his outburst at the slumber party; Sam's encounter with a new man reignites old insecurities.

episodes.name: Rise and Wine
episodes.overview: As Kyle and Carl devise a plan to make Chris feel like one of the guys, a visit to a vineyard continues to strengthen Ciara and Danielle's friendship; the girl's night turns sour for Lindsay.

episodes.name: Hazed and Confused
episodes.overview: A confrontation during a girls-night dinner opens a rift between Lindsay and Danielle; Ciara considers a fling as a new man joins the house; everyone gets ready to send it at Kyle's 40th birthday party.

episodes.name: Holy Cow, Kyle is 40
episodes.overview: Kyle celebrates his 40th birthday with a Western-themed rager, and sparks fly between Kory and Sam; Lindsay and Danielle confront their issues; Paige is surprised by a revelation from Craig.

episodes.name: Who Wears the Crazy Pants
episodes.overview: While Kyle’s 40th birthday party comes to a dramatic end, Lindsay and Carl throw a housewarming party, and Danielle arrives with baggage. Back in the Hamptons, Sam and Kory’s flirtation heats up. Carl takes Danielle aside to clear the air.

episodes.name: Pity Party
episodes.overview: Carl and Danielle's confrontation continues and causes a late-night breakdown; Kory and Sam's relationship heats up as Amanda gets some shocking health news.

episodes.name: Ring of Fire
episodes.overview: Danielle and Chris host a Latin dinner night as Andrea and his girlfriend, Lexi, join the housemates for the weekend; Kory confesses his feelings about Sam; Carl has an engagement ring, but a trip to the hospital threatens to derail his plans.

episodes.name: The Hangover
episodes.overview: Carl throws Lindsay a surprise engagement party, but the reaction to their nuptial news shocks everyone; the housemates hit the beach for a game of flag football; Carl is surprised to be confronted by a friend from outside the house.

episodes.name: (Don't) Let Them Eat Cake
episodes.overview: The housemates plan a yacht day, but Carl and Lindsay seem ready to abandon ship; a shocking DM forces Mya to reevaluate her relationship with Oliver; Craig's frustration with his long-distance relationship with Paige boils over.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Jungle
episodes.overview: As summer comes to an end, the housemates throw a jungle-themed Labor Day party; Ciara takes her costume game to the next level while Mya confronts Oliver; Danielle and Lindsay have a conversation that changes their friendship forever.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: Lindsay and Carl defend their relationship against behind-the-scenes allegations; Paige makes a shocking revelation about her friendship with Lindsay; an old wound causes drama between Kyle and Carl.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: Mya reveals new details about her breakup with Oliver; Danielle and Lindsay ponder the end of a 7-year friendship; an emotional standoff between Carl and Kyle has everyone in tears, including Andy.

episodes.name: Declaration of Codependence
episodes.overview: The housemates head back to the Hamptons for another summer of fun; Ciara is open to a summer romance.

episodes.name: House of Cards
episodes.overview: Kyle tries to repair the damage caused by venting to Paige about his future with Amanda; Ciara feels a spark with new housemate West; Lindsay and Carl return to the packing issues nobody saw coming.

episodes.name: Elephant on the Beach
episodes.overview: Carl and Lindsay find themselves in conflict while Amanda and Kyle try to get back on track; West consults Paige on taking the next step with Ciara; Lindsay drops a bomb as she and Paige agree to move forward in their friendship.

episodes.name: Runaway Bride
episodes.overview: Ciara gets closer to West; the group confronts Jesse about flirting with Paige; the dynamic between Lindsay and Carl leaves everyone questioning the strength of their relationship; Kyle wonders about his relationship with Amanda.

episodes.name: The Camptons
episodes.overview: Ciara and West cuddle up during the campout; a conversation with Craig leaves Kyle worried about his future with Paige; Lindsay shocks the girls with a confession about Carl.

episodes.name: Start Your Engines
episodes.overview: Carl comes to the house a day late, hoping to avoid the Friday night curse; Paige toes the line between wanting her independence and taking a leap with Craig; Ciara is forced to look back at her past and confides in Craig.

episodes.name: Loverboy to Flower Boy
episodes.overview: Lindsay and Carl get a much-needed reset after spending Friday night apart; Amanda pushes Kyle to consider life in the suburbs; Jesse breaks the bro code as Ciara and West continue to grow closer.

episodes.name: Point Break
episodes.overview: Kyle and Amanda confront their communication issues; Lindsay shares shocking details about her sex life; a step forward for Ciara's career could mean a step backward in her relationship with West.

episodes.name: Close Encounters
episodes.overview: Kyle and Amanda work on compromising; West meets Ciara's manager; a career conversation between Carl and Lindsay takes a surprising turn; Danielle and Gabby go for the same guy.

episodes.name: The Parent Trap
episodes.overview: Danielle's out-of-this-world behavior has Paige ready to blast off; Amanda considers a career outside of Loverboy; during a visit to the Jersey shore, Carl receives some surprising tough love from his parents.

episodes.name: Witchin' and Bitchin'
episodes.overview: A conversation about their future leaves Paige and Craig uneasy about the present; while West receives an exciting opportunity, Jesse worries about his upcoming doctor's appointment; Carl wrestles with how to tell Lindsay about his parents' concerns.

episodes.name: Rocking the Boat
episodes.overview: Carl and Lindsay disagree on their definitions of support as West is questioned on his intentions with Ciara; Jesse hits a breaking point with his upcoming scan looming; Amanda expresses her desire to do something for herself.

episodes.name: Excess Baggage
episodes.overview: The fallout from Amanda and Kyle's conversation continues; Lindsay and Carl struggle to get on the same page; West takes Ciara on a dream date; Jesse finds out if his cancer has returned.

episodes.name: From Dusk Till Donne
episodes.overview: As Danielle celebrates the launch of her app, Jesse Solomon gets the long-awaited results of his five-year cancer scan; a visit with Kyle's family provides a welcome reset for him and Amanda; Lindsay and Carl continue to struggle with communication.

episodes.name: Point of No Return
episodes.overview: As the final weekend of the summer arrives, the housemates throw a doomsday-themed party. Ciara wonders if West is capable of commitment. Lindsay and Carl reach a breaking point.

episodes.name: Reunion Part 1
episodes.overview: As the reunion kicks off, Ciara and West reveal what happened between them after the cameras went down. Paige makes a shocking revelation about her friendship with Lindsay.

episodes.name: Reunion Part 2
episodes.overview: The dramatic reunion concludes as West and Ciara consider their future. Amanda makes an emotional revelation about her health. Lindsay and Carl go head-to-head about the details of their breakup.
